data.text: Yahweh also says, “You people of Babylon,
You will be slaves, so take heavy stones
You will be naked and very ashamed.
The one who frees us people of Judah, whom we call ‘the Commander of the armies of angels’,
I was angry with the people whom I chose to belong to me,
You said, ‘We will rule other nations forever;
You people of Babylon who enjoy pleasure and sex,
But both of those things will happen to you suddenly:
You felt protected even though you were doing many wicked things,
So you will experience terrible things,
So you can continue to perform all your magic spells [IRO]!
But all that has resulted from your doing all the things that the magicians have told you to do is that you have become tired!
But they cannot do that, because they are like [SIM] straw that is burning in a fire;
The people whom you have associated with and worked with since you were young
